title: Replace heart, flower, and balloon visual assets with high-quality recognizable graphics

requirements.text: Generate and use a high-quality heart image asset that renders as a clearly recognizable, smooth, sharp heart shape. The graphic must have clean edges, proper heart proportions, and be visually premium — not distorted, abstract, or unclear. Use this asset in the FloatingHearts component to replace the current heart graphic. All animation properties (movement, speed, opacity, size variation, count, placement, z-index, layering, distribution) must remain exactly unchanged.

quotes: Replace the current floating hearts with new, high-quality heart graphics. The hearts must clearly look like proper heart shapes. They should be visually sharp, smooth, and easily recognizable. They must not look distorted, unclear, abstract, or like random shapes. Keep the same animation style, movement, placement, layering, and intensity as before.

acceptanceCriteria: The heart graphic is clearly and immediately recognizable as a proper heart shape
The graphic is sharp, smooth, and visually premium with no distortion or abstract appearance
All FloatingHearts animation parameters (count, speed, opacity, size, placement, z-index, distribution) are identical to before
No theme colors, background, or any other UI element is changed

requirements.text: Generate and use a high-quality flower image asset that renders as a clearly recognizable flower with visible, properly shaped petals. The graphic should be aesthetically pleasing, realistic-looking, and premium. Use this asset in the FlowerRain component to replace the current flower graphic. All animation properties (falling behavior, timing, speed, count, intensity logic, placement, z-index) must remain exactly unchanged.

quotes: Replace the current falling flowers with clearer, more realistic flower graphics. The flowers must clearly look like flowers (petals visible and properly shaped). They should be aesthetically pleasing and premium-looking. Keep the same falling animation behavior. Maintain the same intensity logic (flowers dominant when decorate is clicked). Do not change animation timing or layout behavior.

acceptanceCriteria: The flower graphic clearly shows a flower with visible, properly shaped petals
The graphic is aesthetically pleasing, realistic, and premium-looking
All FlowerRain animation parameters (count, timing, speed, placement, z-index, intensity logic per stage) are identical to before
No theme colors, background, or any other UI element is changed

requirements.text: Generate and use a high-quality balloon image asset that renders as a clearly recognizable balloon with proper balloon shape and a visible string at the bottom. The graphic should be visually attractive and easily identifiable as a balloon. Use this asset in the BalloonAnimation component to replace the current balloon graphic. All animation properties (upward flying movement, speed, count, intensity balance, placement, z-index, layering) must remain exactly unchanged.

quotes: Replace the current balloons with proper balloon graphics. Balloons must clearly look like balloons (with proper shape and string). They should be visually attractive and easily identifiable. Keep the same upward flying animation. Maintain the same intensity balance (balloons slightly more dominant when activated). Do not modify any animation flow or screen layering.

acceptanceCriteria: The balloon graphic clearly shows a proper balloon shape with a visible string at the bottom
The graphic is visually attractive and immediately identifiable as a balloon
All BalloonAnimation parameters (count, speed, upward movement, placement, z-index, intensity balance per stage) are identical to before
No theme colors, background, or any other UI element is changed

constraints: Do NOT change any text or wording anywhere in the app
Do NOT change any button styling, colors, or hover effects
Do NOT change the romantic pink theme or any theme colors
Do NOT change any transition or animation timing
Do NOT change the stage sequence or app state logic
Do NOT change the layout structure or component hierarchy
Do NOT change any animation movement style, speed, count, opacity, size variation, z-index, or distribution logic
Do NOT change any code logic — only the visual asset files used by FloatingHearts, FlowerRain, and BalloonAnimation components
nonGoals: Adding new animations or motion behaviors
Changing the number of hearts, flowers, or balloons at any stage
Modifying the app state machine or stage transitions
Altering background colors or the romantic theme palette

required: Smooth, sharp, high-quality deep rose-pink heart shape with clean edges, proper symmetrical proportions, soft gradient shading from rose to magenta, on a transparent background (heart-graphic.dim_120x120.png)
Realistic premium flower with fully visible soft pink and blush-white petals arranged in a natural bloom pattern, golden yellow center, on a transparent background (flower-graphic.dim_120x120.png)

Vibrant colorful balloon with a smooth oval balloon body in bright pink/red, subtle highlight sheen, and a thin curved string hanging from the bottom knot, on a transparent background (balloon-graphic.dim_80x140.png)
